name: Esc (Kwarf)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 45.

This was the first time I entered Ludum Dare using a proper game engine (Godot). I thought this would be fun, since I could focus less on code, and more on gameplay and assets. However I didn't really enjoy either of those parts as much as I usually like engine design.

It's a basic platformer. Initially I wanted more content and items, to make it better fit with the theme, but I couldn't find motivation enough to give it 100%. It's at least "winnable", and has a form of scoring.

Controls

  • A/D or Left/Right to move
  • Spacebar or Up to jump
  • E to open doors
